NK001(ka)003:0: skyabs 'gro yan lag drug pa'i phyag yul dang skyabs gnas gsal 'debs bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)003:1: e ma hoh rang gnas 'og min dag pa'i zhing
NK001(ka)003:2: mchog lnga ldan ye shes rtsal snang las grub rat+na'i
NK001(ka)003:4: dpag bsam ljon shing yal ga lnga ldan lo 'dab
NK001(ka)003:5: me tog 'bras bu'i- mdzes 'dzum mkha' dbyings rgya che'i
NK001(ka)003:6: rgyan gyur pa'i // .bus kyi yal steng seng+gesa btegs
NK001(ka)003:7: pa'i rin chen khri khar sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab stong
NK001(ka)003:9: bde gshegs kun 'dus mtsho skyes rdo rje dkar dmar
NK001(ka)003:10: mdangs 'phro rdo rje thod 'dzin theg gsum rtags rdzogs
NK001(ka)003:11: skyil krung bzhugs // . gtsug nam mkhar bi ma
NK001(ka)003:12: mi tra ljang ser skyil krung mnyam bzhag thod 'dzin
NK001(ka)003:13: rab byung chas rdzogs pan zhwa gsol //
NK001(ka)003:14: . gtsug mkha' dbus dz+ny+aa na s+au tra dkar dmar
NK001(ka)003:15: skyil krung mnyam bzhag steng glegs bam rab byung chas
NK001(ka)003:17: . gtsug mkha' klong sh+r+ai seng dmar smug he ru
NK001(ka)003:18: ka pa'i chas rol phyag g.yas sdigs mdzub mkhar gtad
NK001(ka)003:19: g.yon thod 'dzin // . gtsug dag mkhar 'jam dpal
NK001(ka)003:20: bshes gnyen dmar gsal he-ru ka pa'i chas rol phyag
NK001(ka)003:22: . gtsug dwangs mkhar dga' rab rdo rje dkar gsal
NK001(ka)003:23: skyil krung rdor dril bsnol thabs rab byung chas rdzogs
NK001(ka)003:24: mtshan dpes spras // . gtsug mkha' dbyings rdor sems
NK001(ka)003:25: yab yum dkar mdzes skyil krung rdor dril 'dzin sbyor
NK001(ka)003:26: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyan chas brgyan //
NK001(ka)003:27: . gtsug dbyings su kun bzang yab mthing yum mchog
NK001(ka)003:28: mthing skya gcer bu mnyam bzhag skyil krung 'khril sbyor
NK001(ka)003:29: mtshan dpe 'bar // 'khor lo'i dbang phyug bla ma de kun gyi //
NK001(ka)003:30: mtshan dpe'i sku yi 'od lngas mkha' khyab klong //
NK001(ka)003:31: 'phags yul rgyan mchog pan grub thams cad dang //
NK001(ka)003:32: bod kyi gsar rnying bka' brgyud bla ma'i tshogs //
NK001(ka)003:33: byin rlabs thugs rje'i gzi byin ldan par bsgom //
NK001(ka)003:34: mdun gyi yal steng seng khri pad zla'i gdan la
NK001(ka)003:35: ston pa sh+aakya seng+ge gser mdog mtshan bzang dpe byad
NK001(ka)003:36: 'bar // mtha' bskor phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas
NK001(ka)003:37: dkon mchog ji snyed sprin phung 'khrigs ltar lhang nge
NK001(ka)003:39: g.yas kyi yal steng pad zla'i gdan la nye sras
NK001(ka)003:40: chen po brgyad sogs chos kyi sprin mthar gnas pa'i
NK001(ka)003:41: sems dpa' la // byang sems 'phags tshogs ma lus
NK001(ka)003:42: kyis bskor kun kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rgyan chas
NK001(ka)003:43: spras shing bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs //
NK001(ka)003:44: g.yon gyi yal steng nyan thos chen po mchog brgyad
NK001(ka)003:45: la sogs nyan rang dgra bcom rnams kyis gtsor byas
NK001(ka)003:46: mtha' bskor du /// ga dman slob pa'i 'phags tshogs
NK001(ka)003:47: bzhugs pa kun kyang mkhar bsil lhung bzed bsnams shing
NK001(ka)003:48: rab tu byung ba'i chas kyis spras //
NK001(ka)003:49: rgyab kyi yal steng pad nyi zla bar rtogs pa'i
NK001(ka)003:50: rnam rol yum chen gser mdangs longs spyod chas rdzogs
NK001(ka)003:51: bzhugs pa'i sku'i // g.yas g.yon steng du 'od lnga'i
NK001(ka)003:52: d+r+wa mig 'khyil klong lung gi bdag nyid glegs bam
NK001(ka)003:53: rnam pas chos sgra sgrogs par gsal //
NK001(ka)003:54: phyogs kyi bar mtshams bzhi po thams cad ni //
NK001(ka)003:55: ye shes las grub rdo rje'i dam tshig can //
NK001(ka)003:56: bstan srung rgya mtsho'i sprin ltar gtams pa yis //
NK001(ka)003:57: byang chub sgrub pa'i gegs rnams bsal bar mdzad //
NK001(ka)003:58: skyabs gnas kun gyis bdag sogs sems can la //
NK001(ka)003:59: thugs kyis dgongs shing zhal gyis rab tu phyogs //
NK001(ka)003:60: spyan ras gzigs te byang chub la 'god phyir //
NK001(ka)003:61: 'dren pa'i ded dpon chen por bzhugs par bsgom //
NK001(ka)003:62: pha ma dgra bgegs gnyis kyis gtsor byas pa'i //
NK001(ka)003:63: bdag sogs ma gyur mkha' mnyam sems can kun //
NK001(ka)003:64: khyed shes dad pas sgo gsum gus btud de //
NK001(ka)003:65: dad mos drag pos phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi //
